entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to snow mixed with rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
